title: Pose Detection
description: Strike a pose! In this video, I explore the BodyPose model in ml5.js with MoveNet and BlazePose, showing how to track body keypoints and visualize 'skeleton' connections using live video.

codeExamples.title: BodyPose - single image
codeExamples.description: Sketch demonstrating use of BodyPose model with an image.

codeExamples.title: BodyPose - Nose
codeExamples.description: Sketch demonstrating use of BodyPose model with a circle drawn at the nose keypoint.

codeExamples.title: BodyPose - Nose with Lerp
codeExamples.description: Sketch demonstrating use of BodyPose model with lerp.

codeExamples.title: BodyPose - More Parts
codeExamples.description: Sketch demonstrating shapes drawn at multiple keypoints.

codeExamples.title: BodyPose - Hat
codeExamples.description: Sketch demonstrating how to place and rotate a shape on the body according to keypoint positions.

codeExamples.title: BodyPose - 3D BlazePose
codeExamples.description: Sketch demonstrating use of the 3D BlazePose model.
